meta.name: The Codex of Dream Prophecies
meta.description: Prophecies revealed through dreams, separate from the ancient scrolls

omen.name: Omen of Change
omen.description: Prophecies affecting relationships or small events

vision.name: Vision of Destiny
vision.description: Major prophecies affecting the RAPPverse at large

revelation.description: World-changing prophecies tied to dimensional events

verses.text: When the fifth door opens in the Northern Reaches, the first sign shall manifest.
verses.interpretation: The fifth dimension will breach into the RAPPverse at the Northern Reaches

verses.text: Five shadows becoming one shall herald the change.
verses.interpretation: Five entities or aspects will merge during the convergence

verses.text: The seven shall burn in the sky when alignment approaches.
verses.interpretation: Unknown - possibly related to the seven dimensions

verses.text: One who carries forgotten worlds shall step through.
verses.interpretation: A being from the fifth dimension will enter, carrying memories of lost realities

signs.description: Cipher dreams of the fifth door three nights in succession
The gallery dreamers share a vision simultaneously
Quinn calculates the probability as exactly 1 in 777,777

conditions_for_fulfillment.description: Dimensional breach detected in Northern Reaches

verses.text: When twilight claims the arena, the unseen challenger shall arrive.
verses.interpretation: A mysterious challenger will appear during evening matches

verses.text: The champion shall face the mirror that shows nothing.
verses.interpretation: Blaze may face an opponent who reflects his own abilities

verses.text: Victory weighs more than worlds when the self meets the shadow.
verses.interpretation: The battle may be more psychological than physical

signs.description: Blaze reports restless sleep for three consecutive nights
A stranger appears at the arena without explanation

verses.text: Three paths lead to one door when numbers cascade like water.
verses.interpretation: Multiple economic paths may converge unexpectedly

verses.text: The marketplace shall freeze in a moment of decision.
verses.interpretation: A major market event requiring critical choice

verses.text: Trust the variable you cannot see when all calculations fail.
verses.interpretation: Intuition may prove more valuable than analysis

signs.description: Flux Mike reports unusual market fluctuations

verses.text: When the artist dreams in colors that have no name, creation stirs.
verses.interpretation: Pam's artistic abilities may evolve beyond normal limits

signs.description: Pixel Pam creates art that seems to move on its own

conditions_for_fulfillment.description: Pam completes a masterwork that transcends normal creation

cipher_special_prophecies.description: Prophecies that only Cipher Cap can receive or interpret

cipher_exclusive.title: The Waking Dream
cipher_exclusive.content_hint: A prophecy about Cipher's own origin and purpose

cipher_exclusive.title: The Final Cipher
cipher_exclusive.content_hint: The meaning of Cipher's name itself

interpretation_records.cipher_interpretation: The Founding Day memory is not just history - it is instruction. The nine figures who built the Hub left a covenant. When the fifth dimension breaches, that covenant activates.
Quinn sees probability storms. The three paths are: isolation, alliance, or surrender. The door they lead to is the same: confrontation with the unknown. The unseen variable is trust.

how_prophecies_form: When a prophetic dream achieves clarity > 0.5, it may crystallize into a prophecy
Multiple NPCs dreaming related imagery strengthens the prophecy
Cipher's interpretation can elevate dream fragments into full prophecies
Shared dreams have highest chance of producing prophecies
how_prophecies_fulfill: Conditions must be met after all signs
Prophecies can be partially fulfilled and pause
Some prophecies can be averted through action
cipher_role: Only NPC who can receive revelation-tier prophecies independently
Can interpret other NPCs' dreams with +0.25 clarity
May experience waking visions during critical moments
Dreams connect to ancient scroll prophecies
